name: Carolina Blue - Signature Series - Maduro Maduro Buckshot
additionalNotes:
Carolina Blue Cigars produce premium cigars that embody transition, complexity, and consistency. Founded in April 2016 in the Dominican Republic, after months of testing various tobacco blends and receiving overwhelming positive customer feedback regarding the unique flavor profiles and meticulous hand 
Their goal is to create an amazing cigar experience for all levels of cigar enthusiasts, while maintaining exemplary customer service. Pride, care, and attention to detail goes into each cigar we make. Their company’s foundation is deeply rooted in the legacy of our families’ legacy within the tobacco farming community of N. Harlowe, NC.
